title: Final Fantasy 16 Nears Completion, PlayStation Plus Controversy - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.29.22
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Final Fantasy XVI, PS Plus updates, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:00 - Housekeeping
A new episode of PS I Love You XOXO is live right now, and it’s us talking about the storm of Playstation news happening leading into the PS Plus revamp. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/kidnafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady,Pranksy,& Anonymous
The Roper Report  -
00:02:50 - Final Fantasy 16 Is in the 'Final Stages of Development' - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:21:03 - Sony has confirmed it’s blocked PS Plus and Now subscription stacking - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:26:30 - PSN Conversion rate is whack - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:32:50 - Ad
00:36:05 - Sonic 2 Is the Highest Grossing Video Game Movie Ever In the U.S. - Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:41:15 - PlayStation hires former Kabam and Zynga executives to mobile business - Danielle Partis @ GiBiz
00:45:40 - Out today
 Reader mail  -
00:47:48 - - Nevans Island
00:56:50 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
MON: Blessing and Tim
TUES: Greg and Gary
WED: Blessing and Janet
THURS: Greg and Tim
FRI: Greg and Bless
